title: Archiving Object

originalLanguage.title: Original Language
originalLanguage.description: Original language of the ABAP object

writeClass.title: Write Class
writeClass.description: Name of executable class or program which writes the data to the archive

deleteClass.title: Delete Class
deleteClass.description: Name of executable class or program which deletes the data from the tables

reloadClass.title: Reload Class
reloadClass.description: Name of executable class or program which reloads the data to the tables (may be empty)

storageClass.title: Storage Class
storageClass.description: Name of class which stores and retrieves archived data. The class needs to implement the interface IF_ARCH_STORAGE_MANAGER.

tablesToBeArchived.title: Tables to Be Archived
tablesToBeArchived.description: Tables of business object instance from which data is archived.

items.title: Table to Be Archived
items.description: Tables of business object instance from which data is archived

archivingClasses.title: Archiving Classes
archivingClasses.description: Archiving classes are no ABAP classes, but IDs of reuse objects, whose data should be archived Together with the business object instance (for example change documents).

items.title: Name of Archiving Class
items.description: Archiving classes are no ABAP classes, but IDs of reuse objects, whose data should be archived Together with the business object instance (for example change documents).
